reviews.reviews.text: Pros: Standard Echo. Cons: Older generation Echo. Other Thoughts: Arrived on time and was new in box.
Pros: Got it for under 50, much impressive sound than 2nd gen. Has every other functionality. Cons: May be not trendy looking as newer, but still sets well on my kitchen island
